__e: How about... how about tonight, you be the prisoner of love?
I'm a prisoner in my own body.
You are freer than anyone else. It's a pity you have to stay in a world like this.
Well. I want to know about you. About the kind of man... who would keep a woman locked in a room away from her children... when there are people downstairs who...
You don't know what it's like. To, to be trapped forever in the light of the sun! Not to be able to feel, to touch!
I get that, but I don't think keeping me locked up in this compound like a prisoner is what he had in mind.
